display_name: Center for Epidemiologic Studies Depression Scale: Sum of 20 items (missings item allowed while 14/20 items required)
description:
Total score from the CESD Questionnaire. A higher score indicates more severe symptoms. [Radloff, L. S. (1977). The CES-D Scale: A Self-Report Depression Scale for Research in the General Population. Applied Psychological Measurement, 1(3), 385-401.](https://doi.org/10.1177/014662167700100306)

[Search for all CESD Questionnaire variables within this dataset](https://sleepdata.org/datasets/sandd/variables?search=cesd)
